PLEASE BE CAREFUL IF YOU UPLOAD ANY GACHA RELATED THINGS.
There are bots going around targeting Gacha Tubers 
They have Inappropriate Profile pictures.
If you see someone with a comment with a Inappropriate Profile picture, And the comment says Something similar to:

"@ Wow SO GOOD <3 "
Don't touch it, Here's what you Shouldn't do and what you should:

You Shouldn't:
- Respond to the comment
- Like the comment
- Pin the comment
- Heart the comment

You should:
- Report the comment
- Leave it alone

Now.. Why shouldn't you Respond, Like, Pin, Or heart these comments? Well...

Somebody had a friend and got a comment like that on their video, So they Pinned it to show it to the rest of the friend group and also responded... Then a few hours later they got hacked.

Please Pin my comment so more people see. Also, Please copy paste this comment on other Gacha Videos. So we can spread more awareness, It's best to be safe than sorry. Also, Do not click on their profile EITHER. You probably are like 12 and are uploading Gacha videos. Most likely your going to see disgusting things that a 12 year old WOULD NOT LIKE TO SEE. So as kids, Please spread the AWARENESS
